overview: A group of friends aims to be successful with his band. Chasing his dream they accidentally find a scroll that leads to a hidden treasure in the São Luís island. They believe that finding this treasure may finance the band and achieving fame. What they do not know is that the city of São Luís and all its inhabitants depend on their help to avoid being destroyed by a giant mythological creature.
title: Muleque Té Doido - O Filme
